item.title: How networking helps you land a perfect job
item.description:
If you are looking for work, take advantage of networking and personal relationship. The longer the relationship lasts, the more advantageous it becomes.

There was a young guy I have known for 7 year and yesterday I offered him a job immediately after he asked.

The work was simple. Compensation was generous, 1 day pay for at most half hour work. Location superb, WFH guaranteed.

item.title: A sentimental husband
item.description:
Caller: My husband is such a sentimental person.

Radio host: Oh? What makes you say that?

Caller: Well, he remained calm when I dropped my diamond ring 2 years ago, and he was cool when our new mansion suffered a terrible flooding. But yesterday, I threw away an old bag with just a few old USB keys, and he’s been crying nonstop!

Radio host: (laughs) That’s quite a contrast! What’s so special about that old bag?
